Mr. Watson said word of Mr. Andy Coulson 's resignation had been`` sneaked out'' on a busy news day when former Tony Blair was testifying before an inquiry into the Iraq war. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth, Mr. Watson said. For the Labour Party, Mr. Andy Coulson 's departure partly overshadowed its own woes over the departure of Mr. Johnson, a veteran Labour official and former government minister. Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. Facebook, on the other hand,`` has clearly stated they don't want to get into the search business. Facebook users tend to use Google search.
